summary:
ISSUES
Critical:
- The "How It Works" page failed the web performance test. It is essential to investigate the cause of this failure and optimize the page to improve its load time.
insights: The Time to First Byte (TTFB) metric is relatively low for all pages, indicating that the server's response time is fast. This is a good sign, as it means that users will see content on the page quickly.

The First Contentful Paint (FCP) metric is also low for most pages, indicating that the page's above-the-fold content is loading quickly. This is crucial for providing a good user experience, as users will see content on the page quickly.

The duration metric is a good indicator of the page's overall performance. The lower the duration, the better the page's performance. It is essential to optimize pages with high durations to improve user experience.
